Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_SCD2;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.Spacecraft = SCD2;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.Filename = 'SCD2_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_SCD2.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
